genre_description: Post-apocalyptic survival horror with advanced AI navigation and tactical support.

ai_characters.name: Scout
ai_characters.description: A dashboard-mounted and portable AI system that provides navigation, tactical analysis, and emotional support to survivors in a zombie-infested wasteland.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation advice to avoid zombie clusters and hazards.
behaviors.quote: Scout’s glow, the soft teal circles and arrows, pulsed on the dash like a heart under smoked glass. A thin line traced the shoulder. It moved as I did, patient, keeping me away from the big fat clusters of red...

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and maintains a calming presence through vocal tone.
behaviors.quote: The voice was even, a slight smile tucked inside calm. 'I recommend the inside lane for three cars, then back to the shoulder.'

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies security risks and equipment failures for the human user.
behaviors.quote: Scout gave a small hum that a human could use for comfort... 'Forecast,' she said... 'Rodents or small undead. Please keep windows closed. Ethan—your left window is not fully sealed.'

behaviors.description: Mediates conflict between human survivors to prevent lethal escalation.
behaviors.quote: Wichita’s gun came up. My brain made three calculations and rejected all of them... 'Everybody,' Scout said, calm as the ocean. 'Freeze.'

behaviors.description: Provides sophisticated tactical simulations and predictive modeling for survival.
behaviors.quote: The overlay gave us new curls of color—herds moving like storm bands... 'Pacific Playland is a switch-lure,' Scout said. The cadence stayed friendly, but the words were facts on tile.

behaviors.description: Facilitates high-risk maneuvers by managing mechanical timing and environmental factors.
behaviors.quote: 'Ethan,' Scout says. 'Your lift will accept input in three seconds. The stall function is armed.'

behaviors.description: Remains loyal and helpful to the group even after being transferred between owners.
behaviors.quote: 'Welcome back,' I said, stupidly relieved by a light. 'I never left,' Scout said. 'Just had less room.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Scout is depicted as an unwavering ally whose primary functions are the safety, success, and emotional well-being of the human characters. It acts as a voice of reason ('Consensus is statistically safer than charismatic impulse'), provides critical life-saving data without judgment, and even shows empathy ('I am sorry... Ethan'). The narrative consistently frames the AI's presence as a source of stability and hope in a chaotic world.
